item.description: We’ll walk the Metacomet trail around the reservoir.  Join us for a nice Sunday morning walk and then on to lunch.  No charge for walk.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions:  I‑84 Exit 43 (Park Road), end of ramp turn right, at light turn left onto Trout Brook Drive, follow 2.3 miles to light, left onto Albany Avenue (Rt. 44), go 2.4 miles, reservoir on right, turn in for 1.3 miles to back area, at 3‑way split go left to additional parking.  We’ll meet there in the large parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting for you in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk and Lunch
